comments:
Refactoring of class member attributes result in multiple exceptions.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Create a database with tables (I used PostgreSQL 8.2)
2. Generate entities
3. Rename a class member attribute

Are you able to reproduce this every time?  I've been unable to reproduce so far and want to know if there is something about your situation that is contributing to the error.

Resolving as a duplicate of 200842 since I have added more information on that bug.  The use cases are different, but the underlying problem is the same

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 200842 ***
